attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: it time Penionier were Given bigger pensions,as they are one's that have been paying from the start. Now everyone else get looked after first

rejection.details:
Your title should be a call for action, not a statement / name.

http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/account/
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
